fields.label: Equipment Delivery Address
fields.name: equipment_delivery_address
fields.note: Please include the complete address including State and Postcode/ZipCode

fields.label: Phone No.
fields.name: phone_no
fields.type: (Please include international area code if applicable.)

fields.label: Earliest date to receive and store stock
fields.name: earliest_date_to_receive_and_store_stock

fields.label: Can a semi-trailer access your delivery area?
fields.name: can_a_semi_trailer_access_your_delivery_area
fields.note: (For example city streets, Restricted parking times, low laying power lines etc.)

fields.label: Do you require extra flooring?
fields.name: do_you_require_extra_flooring
fields.note: (Does your studio need more than the scheduled 160 sqm flooring? Please take into consideration that the turf is 43.2 sqm. You do not need to lay the rubber tiles under the turf. So all in all you have 160 sqm rubber tiles and 43.2 sqm of turf which totals = 203.2 sqm)

fields.label: Any notes from the equipment schedule:
fields.name: variation_notes
